cause.description:
Generally, type 1 diabetes is diagnosed in children, teenagers, or young adults. Scientists do not yet know exactly what causes type 1 diabetes, but they believe that autoimmune, genetic, and environmental factors are involved. (from jdrf.org)
Note: You are allowed to write personal stories and positive comments on the wall. However, if you post a negative comment directed towards the cause or a member, it will be deleted. We won't tolerate it. Please be respectful.
Thank you all for your support.
1. We must find a cure for diabetes in our lifetime.
2. Inspire others to be involved.
cause.mission: Find a cure for Type 1 Juvenile Diabetes
cause.name: CURE DIABETES
